property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.

property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The name of the default file system. A URI whose scheme and authority determine the FileSystem implementation. The uri's scheme determine:s the config property (fs.SCHEME.impl) naming the FileSystem implementation class. The uri's authority is used to determine the host, port, etc. for a filesystem.
